item.title: Week 02 - Working with Data (Part 1)
item.description: General Handouts Lab Problem Set 01 Lecture 02a - Introducing ggplot2 Lecture Handouts Functions Slides Video Lecture Lecture 02b - Grammar of Graphics Lecture Handouts Functions Slides Video Lecture Lecture 03 - Verbs for Cleaning Data Lecture Handouts Functions Slides Video Lecture Lecture 04 - Structuring Notebooks Lecture Handouts Functions Notebook Sample Slides Video Lecture Data for Assignments The data that you need for many of the assignments this semester is available as an R package named testDriveR.
